title: Research Interests
subtitle: Academic Aspirations
description: Areas of interest that I am passionate about.

interests.title: Machine Learning
interests.description: Exploring advanced ML algorithms and their applications in solving complex real-world problems. Particularly interested in supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

interests.title: Natural Language Processing
interests.description: Investigating how machines can understand, interpret, and generate human language. Interested in sentiment analysis, text classification, and language generation.

interests.title: Computer Vision
interests.description: Studying how computers can gain high-level understanding from digital images and videos. Fascinated by object detection, image segmentation, and visual recognition systems.

interests.title: Deep Learning
interests.description: Researching neural network architectures and their applications. Keen to explore transformers, CNNs, RNNs, and their implementations for various domains.
